scripts.cli:debug: echo "Open about:inspect in Chrome -> Open dedicated DevTools for Node -> Resume script execution" && node --inspect-brk build/main/cli.js
scripts.cov: run-s build test:unit cov:html && opn coverage/index.html
scripts.reset: git clean -dfx && git stash && npm i
scripts.install-mac: npm run build && npm run pkg && cp neamtime-log-parser-macos /usr/local/bin/neamtime-log-parser
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm test && npm run build
scripts.release: echo 'ðŸš€ Starting release process...' && git branch --show-current | grep -q '^main$' && npm run check && npm pack && echo 'ðŸ“¦ Package created. Testing locally...' && npm install -g ./neamtime-log-parser-*.tgz && neamtime-log-parser --help && echo 'âœ… Local test passed! Ready to bump version...' && bumpp --commit 'chore: release v%s' --tag 'v%s' --push && npm publish && echo 'ðŸŽ‰ Release complete!'
scripts.release:test: npm run check && npm pack && npm install -g ./neamtime-log-parser-*.tgz && neamtime-log-parser --help && echo 'âœ… Package tests passed!'
scripts.publish:local: npm run build && npm publish --registry http://localhost:4873

scripts-info.info: Display information about the package scripts
scripts-info.fix: Try to automatically fix any linting problems
scripts-info.test: Lint and unit test the project (versioned fixtures only)
scripts-info.test:all: Lint and unit test the project (including unversioned fixtures)
scripts-info.dev-test: Run tests in serial mode (versioned fixtures only)
scripts-info.dev-test:all: Run tests in serial mode (including unversioned fixtures)
scripts-info.watch: Watch and rebuild the project on save, then rerun relevant tests
scripts-info.cov: Rebuild, run tests, then create and open the coverage report
scripts-info.doc: Generate HTML API documentation and open it in a browser
scripts-info.doc:json: Generate API documentation in typedoc JSON format
scripts-info.release: Full release workflow: check, test package, bump version, publish to npm
scripts-info.release:test: Test package build and installation without publishing
scripts-info.reset: Delete all untracked files and reset the repo to the last commit
